## JSONStore interface

Wrapper of the native `Storage`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface JSONStore 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [clear](./jsonify-storage.jsonstore.clear.md) | <code>() =&gt; void</code> | Same as <code>Storage.clear</code> |
|  [get](./jsonify-storage.jsonstore.get.md) | <code>(key: string) =&gt; any</code> | Get the supplied key corresponding value from the <code>Storage</code>, and JSON parse it.<!-- -->If supplied key is not exist or can't parsed with JSON will return null. |
|  [key](./jsonify-storage.jsonstore.key.md) | <code>(index: number) =&gt; string</code> | Same as <code>Storage.key</code> |
|  [length](./jsonify-storage.jsonstore.length.md) | <code>number</code> | Same as <code>Storage.length</code> |
|  [remove](./jsonify-storage.jsonstore.remove.md) | <code>(key: string) =&gt; void</code> | Same as <code>Storage.remove</code>. |
|  [set](./jsonify-storage.jsonstore.set.md) | <code>(key: string, payload: any) =&gt; void</code> | Set a key-val to <code>Storage</code>, but jsonify the value. |
